slackConfig.webhookURL: <fill in your web hook URL from Slack>
slackConfig.loginNotificationChannel: <fill in name of Slack chanel where audit events (login/logoff etc) should be posted>
slackConfig.taskFailureChannel: <fill in name of Slack channel where task failure events should be posted>

udpServerConfig.serverIP: <IP of server where Butler is running>

qrsConfig.virtualProxy: <name of Sense virtual proxy we are connecting to>
